'''Firefighter Kline''' is one of the firefighters at [[SFD Station 19]].

==History==
===Andy's Trial and Cesium===
Kline was eating in the beanery while Vic, Jack, Ben, and Theo talked about Andy's decision not to take the plea deal. Vic said she respected Andy for not taking it and Kline agreed. Most of the rest of the team was then called out to a car accident. Later, he was sweeping the barn when Maya and Carina arrived for Pru's party. He told Maya they'd missed a big call, involving nuclear waste. Both he and Maya were disappointed by that. ''("[[Crawl Out Through the Fallout]]")''

===Andy's Self Defense Class===
Kline volunteered for Andy's self defense class to let the participants practice choke holds. ''("[[Twist and Shout]]")''

===Cryptocurrency Fires===
Kline helped the team fight a fire at an apartment complex where an illegally-wired computer bank started a fire. When they learned it was a crypto mine and there were others around town, Kline went with Maya and Beckett to another one to get it shut down before it could also start a fire. ''("[[Everybody's Got Something to Hide Except Me and My Monkey]]")''

==Career==
He is a firefighter at [[SFD Station 19]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*He makes his first speaking (and credited) appearance in [[Crawl Out Through the Fallout]] yet can be seen in the background as a non-speaking character in multiple earlier episodes.
*The credit for his first speaking appearance spells his name as "Kline" while his uniform in earlier appearances spelled "Klyne". The spelling on his uniform, however, is changed to "Kline" for his first speaking appearance, matching the credit.
